trans-unit.source: Computes aggregates over a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 对一个序列的 Int32 值计算聚合。

trans-unit.source: Finds the average of a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 查找的 Int32 值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> that identifies a group of items to average, such as a column in a table.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>标识一组项要计算平均值，例如表中的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average result of a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 返回一系列 Int32 值的平均值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> value that contains the average result of a sequence of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref>值，该值包含一个序列的平均值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a sequence of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一系列<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否序列为空。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the sequence is empty, otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果序列为空，否则，返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value parameter to the existing result if the value parameter is greater than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 将分配 value 到现有的参数时导致 value 参数大于现有的结果。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the largest value in a sequence of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的最大值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> value that contains the maximum value in a sequence of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref>值，该值包含的序列中的最大值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value parameter to the existing result if the value parameter is less than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 将分配 value 到现有的参数时导致 value 参数小于现有的结果。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest value in a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: Int32 值的序列中返回的最小值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> value that contains the minimum value in a sequence of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref>值，该值包含的序列中的最小值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> value to the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>到现有结果的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sum of a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列的 Int32 值的总和。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> value that contains the sum of a sequence of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref>值，该值包含的序列的和<xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref>值。
